description: This file defines mock data handlers for animal behavior analytics, including functions to retrieve mock animal info, behavior counts, duration breakdowns, heatmaps, behavior types, behaviors, and reports. It primarily provides mock implementations for API endpoints used within the frontend.

methods.name: function normalizeBehaviorType(t: string): string { normalizeBehaviorType
methods.description: Normalizes behavior type strings to a canonical taxonomy, mapping certain labels to standardized categories.

methods.name: getSelectedAnimal
methods.description: Returns enriched mock data for a selected animal, including additional profile fields.

methods.name: getBehaviorCounts
methods.description: Calculates and returns counts of behaviors by type.

methods.name: getDurationBreakdown
methods.description: Returns the total duration of behaviors, aggregated by behavior type.

methods.name: getDailyHeatmap
methods.description: Generates a distribution of behaviors over 24 hours, representing a heatmap.

methods.name: getBehaviorTypes
methods.description: Fetches the list of unique behavior types present in the mock data.

methods.name: getBehaviors
methods.description: Returns the list of behaviors, enriched with normalized types.
